00010 #ifndef BOOST_ASSIGN_V2_CHAIN_TRAITS_USE_LVALUE_ER_2010_HPP
00011 #define BOOST_ASSIGN_V2_CHAIN_TRAITS_USE_LVALUE_ER_2010_HPP
00012 #include <boost/config.hpp>
00013 #include <boost/mpl/and.hpp>
00014 #include <boost/mpl/eval_if.hpp>
00015 #include <boost/mpl/bool.hpp>
00016 #include <boost/mpl/identity.hpp>
00017 #include <boost/type_traits/remove_reference.hpp>
00018 #include <boost/type_traits/is_reference.hpp>
00019 #include <boost/type_traits/is_same.hpp>
00020 #include <boost/type_traits/is_const.hpp>
00021 #include <boost/range/reference.hpp>
00022 
00023 namespace boost{
00024         struct use_default;
00025 namespace assign{
00026 namespace v2{
00027 namespace chain_traits{
00028 
00029     // TODO use is_lvalue_iterator or is_read_iterator
00030 
00031     template<typename U1,typename U2,typename Tag = use_default> 
00032     struct use_lvalue
00033     {
00034         
00035         typedef typename boost::range_reference<U1>::type r1_;
00036         typedef typename boost::range_reference<U2>::type r2_;
00037         typedef boost::mpl::and_<
00038             boost::is_reference<r1_>,
00039             boost::is_reference<r2_>
00040         > are_refs_;
00041         
00042         typedef boost::is_same<r1_,r2_> are_same_;
00043         
00044         typedef boost::mpl::and_<
00045              are_refs_,
00046              are_same_
00047         > are_same_refs_;
00048         
00049         typedef boost::is_const<
00050             typename boost::remove_reference<r1_>::type
00051         > is_const_;
00052         
00053         typedef typename boost::mpl::eval_if<
00054             is_const_,
00055             boost::mpl::identity<boost::mpl::false_>,
00056             are_same_refs_
00057         >::type type;
00058         
00059         BOOST_STATIC_CONSTANT(bool, value = type::value);
00060     };
00061 
00062 }// chain_traits
00063 }// v2
00064 }// assign
00065 }// boost
00066 
00067 #endif
